item.title: Battered Bond Traders Adopt Show-Me Mode to Avoid More Losses
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- Bond investors who were torched yet again by robust economic data now want clear and conclusive proof that Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts are imminent before making any more big bullish wagers. US yields surged to their highest levels of the year last week after traders were dealt...
